tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE designs (
    design_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    design_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    design_file BYTEA NOT NULL,
    design_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    customer_preferences JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE designs (
    design_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    design_name VARCHAR(255),
    designer_id INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    design_file BLOB
);

CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    design_id INT,
    material_preference VARCHAR(50),
    color_preference VARCHAR(50),
    additional_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Pricing (
    pricing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    design_id INT,
    base_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    discount_percent FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (design_id) REFERENCES Designs(design_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerPreferences (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    favorite_design_id INT,
    preferred_material VARCHAR(50),
    design_color VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (favorite_design_id) REFERENCES Designs(design_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    design_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    total_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerPreferences(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (design_id) REFERENCES Designs(design_id)
);

CREATE TABLE designs (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255),
	description TEXT,
	file_path VARCHAR(255)
)
